>** EDA is one of the most important aspect in data analysis. In real world scenario analyst spend more then 65% of time in cleaning the dirty data. So this package helps to get a quick overview of your data which reduce your time.**

source.3a72c5a7:
Sweetviz

Exploratory Data Analysis
Exploratory data analysis is an approach to analyzing data sets to summarize their main characteristics, often with visual methods. There are many packages in python to analyze,visualize,summerise the dataset.Here I'm going to show you the automated EDA tool which do all analysis/visualization/summarization in a single shot!. It takes pandas dataframes and give result in HTML formate.
About sweetviz
Sweetviz is an open source Python library that generates beautiful, high-density visualizations to kickstart EDA (Exploratory Data Analysis) with a single line of code. Output is a fully self-contained HTML application. Since sweetviz is new package unfortunately it is not available to be run in Kaggle kernels. But you can see Sweetviz report from below link.
http://cooltiming.com/SWEETVIZ_REPORT.html
